permission.title: Please allow camera access
permission.description:
Camera access is required to use the real-time posture correction feature.
All data collected by the camera is processed only on my device.

details.title: To better understand you, we have a few questions.
details.description:
This information will be used to personalize your posture correction experience.
Don't worry, this information is securely stored and not shared with others.

complete.title: Setup complete
complete.description:
You are now ready to start posture correction.
Click the button below to begin.
